languages.text: "Первым был Каллигос Винтерскейл. Да-да, сам глава династии Винтерскейл любил сюда захаживать. Впечатляющая личность! Правда, стоило ему и его офицерам перешагнуть порог, как местные по углам шмыгали — его благородие было не прочь не только стакан хлопнуть, но и устроить кровавую баню тем, кто на него криво посмотрел".

traits.locale_text: "Первым был Каллигос Винтерскейл. Да-да, сам глава династии Винтерскейл любил сюда захаживать. Впечатляющая личность! Правда, стоило ему и его офицерам перешагнуть порог, как местные по углам шмыгали — его благородие было не прочь не только стакан хлопнуть, но и устроить кровавую баню тем, кто на него криво посмотрел".

languages.text: "The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. Impressive guy! True, whenever he and his officers came through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — drinks weren't the only thing His Lordship liked knocking back. If someone so much as looked at him funny, he'd paint the walls red."
languages.original_text: "Первым был Каллигос Винтерскейл. Да-да, сам глава династии Винтерскейл любил сюда захаживать. Впечатляющая личность! Правда, стоило ему и его офицерам перешагнуть порог, как местные по углам шмыгали — его благородие было не прочь не только стакан хлопнуть, но и устроить кровавую баню тем, кто на него криво посмотрел".

traits.locale_text: "The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. An impressive individual! Although, the moment he and his officers would come through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — His Lordship enjoyed more than just drinks, he loved throwing a good bloodbath whenever someone looked at him funny."

"The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. An impressive individual! Although, the moment he and his officers would come through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — His Lordship enjoyed more than just drinks, he loved throwing a good bloodbath whenever someone looked at him funny."

"The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. Impressive guy! True, whenever he and his officers came through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — drinks weren't the only thing His Lordship liked knocking back. If someone so much as looked at him funny, he'd paint the walls red."

"The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. Impressive guy! True, whenever he and his officers came through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — drinks weren't the only thing His Lordship liked knocking back. If someone so much as looked at him funny, he'd paint the walls red."

"The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. Impressive guy! True, whenever he and his officers came through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — drinks weren't the only thing His Lordship liked knocking back. If someone so much as looked at him funny, he'd paint the walls red."

languages.text: “第一个人是卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔。没错，温特斯凯尔家族的首领本人以前经常会来这里，他可真是个了不起的家伙！是啊，每次他的他的官员进门的时候，当地人都想赶紧找个洞躲起来。酒可不是那位大人唯一喜欢的东西。如果有人惹火了他，他会拿那些人的血来刷墙。”
languages.original_text: "The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. Impressive guy! True, whenever he and his officers came through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — drinks weren't the only thing His Lordship liked knocking back. If someone so much as looked at him funny, he'd paint the walls red."

traits.locale_text: “第一个人是卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔。没错，温特斯凯尔家族的首领本人以前经常会来这里，他可真是个了不起的家伙！是啊，每次他的他的官员进门的时候，当地人都想赶紧找个洞躲起来。酒可不是那位大人唯一喜欢的东西。如果有人惹火了他，他会拿那些人的血来刷墙。”

languages.text: «El primero fue Calligos Winterscale. Así es, el mismísimo jefe de la casa Winterscale solía venir por aquí. ¡Era un tipo interesante! Cada vez que él y sus agentes entraban por la puerta, los clientes se ponían a cubierto. A su señoría no solo le gustaba beber: si alguien le miraba mal, pintaba las paredes de rojo».
languages.original_text: "The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. Impressive guy! True, whenever he and his officers came through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — drinks weren't the only thing His Lordship liked knocking back. If someone so much as looked at him funny, he'd paint the walls red."

traits.locale_text: «El primero fue Calligos Winterscale. Así es, el mismísimo jefe de la casa Winterscale solía venir por aquí. ¡Era un tipo interesante! Cada vez que él y sus agentes entraban por la puerta, los clientes se ponían a cubierto. A su señoría no solo le gustaba beber: si alguien le miraba mal, pintaba las paredes de rojo».

languages.text: 「1人目はカリゴス・ウィンタースケールだった。そう、ウィンタースケール家のご当主様はここの常連だったんだよ。すごい男だったね！彼や彼の士官があのドアを通ると、地元の奴らは皆サッと隠れるくらいだった。陛下の息抜きは酒だけじゃなかった。少しでも変な目で見てくる奴がいたら、壁を真っ赤に染め上げるほどギタギタにおしおきしてたよ」
languages.original_text: "The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. Impressive guy! True, whenever he and his officers came through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — drinks weren't the only thing His Lordship liked knocking back. If someone so much as looked at him funny, he'd paint the walls red."

traits.locale_text: 「1人目はカリゴス・ウィンタースケールだった。そう、ウィンタースケール家のご当主様はここの常連だったんだよ。すごい男だったね！彼や彼の士官があのドアを通ると、地元の奴らは皆サッと隠れるくらいだった。陛下の息抜きは酒だけじゃなかった。少しでも変な目で見てくる奴がいたら、壁を真っ赤に染め上げるほどギタギタにおしおきしてたよ」

languages.text: "Die erste war Calligos Winterzunder. Ganz recht, der Kopf des Hauses Winterzunder persönlich war Stammgast hier. Ein beeindruckender Mann! Sicher, wenn er und seine Offiziere durch die Tür kamen, suchten die Einheimischen sofort ein Loch, um sich zu verstecken – Drinks waren nicht das Einzige, das bei Seiner Lordschaft nicht lange stehen blieb. Wenn ihn jemand nur schief ansah, strich er mit ihm die Wände rot."
languages.original_text: "The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. Impressive guy! True, whenever he and his officers came through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — drinks weren't the only thing His Lordship liked knocking back. If someone so much as looked at him funny, he'd paint the walls red."

traits.locale_text: "Die erste war Calligos Winterzunder. Ganz recht, der Kopf des Hauses Winterzunder persönlich war Stammgast hier. Ein beeindruckender Mann! Sicher, wenn er und seine Offiziere durch die Tür kamen, suchten die Einheimischen sofort ein Loch, um sich zu verstecken – Drinks waren nicht das Einzige, das bei Seiner Lordschaft nicht lange stehen blieb. Wenn ihn jemand nur schief ansah, strich er mit ihm die Wände rot."

languages.text: « Avant vous, il y a eu Calligos Winterscale. Eh oui, le chef de la maison Winterscale en personne nous rendait souvent visite ! Un type impressionnant. Je ne vais pas vous mentir, quand il passait la porte avec ses officiers, les gens du coin filaient vite se planquer... Je n'irais pas jusqu'à dire que Sa Seigneurie avait l'alcool mauvais, mais pas loin. Si quelqu'un avait le malheur de le regarder vaguement de travers, il se retrouvait la cervelle éclatée contre un mur. »
languages.original_text: "The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. Impressive guy! True, whenever he and his officers came through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — drinks weren't the only thing His Lordship liked knocking back. If someone so much as looked at him funny, he'd paint the walls red."

traits.locale_text: « Avant vous, il y a eu Calligos Winterscale. Eh oui, le chef de la maison Winterscale en personne nous rendait souvent visite ! Un type impressionnant. Je ne vais pas vous mentir, quand il passait la porte avec ses officiers, les gens du coin filaient vite se planquer... Je n'irais pas jusqu'à dire que Sa Seigneurie avait l'alcool mauvais, mais pas loin. Si quelqu'un avait le malheur de le regarder vaguement de travers, il se retrouvait la cervelle éclatée contre un mur. »

languages.text: "İlki, Calligos Winterscale'di. Harbi diyorum. Winterscale Hanesi'nin başı, eskiden müdavimimizdi. Çarpıcı adamdı! Hakikaten de ne zaman subaylarıyla birlikte kapıdan adım atsın, herkes kendine saklanacak delik arardı. Lord Hazretleri, içki devirmeyi sevdiği kadar adam devirmeyi de severdi. Hele bir yan bakan çıksın, başlardı duvarları kırmızıya boyamaya."
languages.original_text: "The first was Calligos Winterscale. That's right, the head of House Winterscale himself used to come here often. Impressive guy! True, whenever he and his officers came through the door, the locals would find themselves a hole to hide in — drinks weren't the only thing His Lordship liked knocking back. If someone so much as looked at him funny, he'd paint the walls red."

traits.locale_text: "İlk kişi, Calligos Winterscale'di. Aynen öyle, Winterscale Hanesi'nin başı, eskiden müdavimimizdi. Amma çarpıcı bir adamdır! Hakikaten de ne zaman subaylarıyla birlikte o kapıdan adım atsın, herkes kendine saklanacak bir delik arardı... Lord Hazretleri, içki devirmeyi sevdiği kadar adam devirmeyi de severdi. Hele bir yan bakan çıksın, anında leşini sererdi."
